main event: A round object was observed in the sky maneuvering silently for 11 minutes in Lorain, Ohio on July 25, 1946.
interesting points: The object was about 1/2 mile away., It made no sound during the observation., The duration of the sighting was 11 minutes., The object's course was not noted., No photographs were included with the report.
witness description: Information about witnesses is not provided.
